scripts.build: yarn --cwd ui install && yarn --cwd ui build
scripts.dev: yarn build && yarn database:migrate --local && yarn pages dev ui/dist --d1 DATABASE --persist --compatibility-date=2022-12-20
scripts.test:ui: yarn build && yarn database:migrate --local && NODE_DEBUG=child_process concurrently -s first --kill-others "yarn pages dev ui/dist --d1 DATABASE --persist --port 6868 --compatibility-date=2022-12-20 || true" "sleep 5 && yarn --cwd ui jest --verbose"
scripts.deploy:init: yarn pages project create wildebeest && yarn d1 create wildebeest
scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn database:migrate && yarn pages publish ui/dist --project-name=wildebeest
